Marielle Fois <marielle at kth dot se>

body.p: This software was initially created as a web solution for the Swedish Committee For Afghanistan. Much inspiration and many ideas for this solution comes from, Erik Gustafsson (Information Coordinator at Swedish Committee), without whom this software would never have come into existence.
This product includes software developed by the Apache Software Foundation (http://www.apache.org/), MySQL AB (http://www.mysql.com/), and the FreeMarker Project (http://freemarker.sourceforge.net/).
